RelatedSentence: It is good that the American Co-Chair also thinks that use of Sarsang reservoir may become one of the basis for cooperation between two independent states Nagorno - Karabakh and Azerbaijan , spokesperson for NKR president Davit Babayan told Armenian News - NEWS.am .
But , Azerbaijan must also show the interest .
It must be a mutually beneficial process , he said .
